## ScriptHost.observe() method

Observes the specified script

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
observe(script: string, options: ScriptObserveOptions): (this: void) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  script | string | The script to observe |
|  options | [ScriptObserveOptions](./scripthost.scriptobserveoptions.md) | Options that control the observation |

<b>Returns:</b>

(this: void) =&gt; void

A callback that shall be invoked to cancel the observation
